author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Extend a typical Java event notification interface.
Extend the java.util.EventListener interface.  Improve class

author: ehu
msg: ra_svn progress support at the same (basic) level as supported by ra_dav.
Resolves the ra_svn part of issue #901: Show progress
(writebuf_output): Call the progress callback iff there's one to call.
(readbuf_input): Add pool parameter; the progress callback needs one. Also
call the progress callback iff there's one to call.
svn_ra_svn_skip_leading_garbage): Add pool argument to readbuf_input()
calls, adding a pool argument to the function if it didn't have one.

author: dlr
msg: Merge r22336 from trunk into the 1.4.x. branch.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r22296: svn_path_local_style only works for directories, don't
(svn_client__update_internal): don't convert a URL to local style.
